Line.Name: Jane
Line.Content: Hey! What are you doing？You are not some sci-fi guy from SURIV, are you?

Line.Name: Player
Line.Content: Wait, WAIT. I'm just a traveler.

Line.Name: Jane
Line.Content: Traveler? There's a WAR going on here. You'd better leave as soon as possible. Sofia can't protect you since you're not her child.

Line.Name: Jane
Line.Content: She is the God. She protects us, gives us food, and makes the sun rise up.

Line.Name: Player
Line.Content: If that so, why there's a war.

Line.Name: Jane
Line.Content: Some infidel do not believe in Sofia anymore. They use some so called "SCINCE" against us. We are in a pretty bad position in this war now.

Line.Name: Player
Line.Content: But you have the protection from Sofia, right?

Line.Name: Jane
Line.Content: So does them! God Sofia loves all her child, not only the believer. That's how good she is.

Line.Name: Jane
Line.Content: We would like some help from our old ally -- The orcs. If one day you met the Cacique of the Orcs, please give this letter to him. Our Saman will wait for their reply.
